poem.title: Silent night
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
The berrs were oot for the bells
When Mary Buttn Benz (his face to see)
Cam cruising doon fae the Himalbergs
On hairpins, and shook out her hair:
A squad of Buddhist bonzes hits the flair
And begs a bowl of purritch.
One by one she beds them down
And bends her mind to squaring this
With the Yogi bears.
